sentences.en: Make sure outrigger were fully extended and installed on firm pad.
sentences.cn: 确保外伸支架全部伸出并稳固于地面上.

sentences.en: Mechanical model for the elastic thick outrigger of roof coal is set up.
sentences.cn: 建立了顶煤弹性深梁力学模型,分析了顶煤应力分布及顶煤破坏形式.

sentences.en: The outrigger tripod is available in both a high and low profile version, to fulfill a diverse array of environmental requirements.
sentences.cn: 外伸的三脚架有高型和低型两种配置，以满足不同的环境要求。

words.tran_cn: 装有外伸支架的；[船] 带有舷外装置的

trans.tran_cn: 舷外支架，突出的梁，桁等
trans.tran_en: a framework for supporting a pontoon outside and parallel to the hull of a boat to provide stability
